data.text: Ao Onyankopɔn, tie me mpaeɛbɔ,
tie me na gye me so.
wɔ deɛ mʼatamfoɔ reka
Mʼakoma wɔ ahoyera mu;
Ehu ne ahopopoɔ akyekyere me.
Mekaa sɛ, “Ao, sɛ mewɔ ntaban sɛ aburuburo a,
anka mɛtu akɔ akyirikyiri
anka mɛyɛ ntɛm akɔ mʼahintaeɛ,
Ao Awurade, ma amumuyɛfoɔ nyɛ basaa, na ma wɔn kasa ntoto,
Awia ne anadwo wɔtetɛ nʼafasuo ho;
Adesɛefoɔ dɔm reyɛ adwuma kuropɔn no mu.
Sɛ ɛyɛɛ ɔtamfoɔ na ɔresopa me a,
Nanso, ɛyɛ wo, ɔdasani te sɛ me,
a kane no na me ne no wɔ ayɔnkofa a emu yɛ den
Ma owuo mmɛfa mʼatamfoɔ mpofirim;
Nanso, mesu frɛ Onyankopɔn,
Anwummerɛ, anɔpa ne awia,
Ɔde ne ho bɔ afɔdeɛ ma me nya me tiri didim
Onyankopɔn a wɔasi no ɔhene afebɔɔ no,
Me yɔnko to hyɛ ne nnamfonom so;
Ɔwɔ tɛkrɛmawoɔ,
Fa wo haw to Awurade so
Nanso, wo, Ao Onyankopɔn, wobɛbrɛ amumuyɛfoɔ ase
